>@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.DAMcKQ3EGXdh8CGe]{Armor Storm}

You become a master of all weapons associated with your armor. You deal 1d6 additional damage with any attack from a weapon that is part of your armor, including unarmed strikes using the @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.class-features.bMrNOiFOJYntHFVF]{Hammer Fist (Ex) (1st)} ability and weapons that have been attached to your armor as an armor upgrade. The additional damage is of the same type as the weaponâ€™s normal type. Also, while wearing heavy or powered armor, you gain a +2 bonus to your KAC against combat maneuvers.
